oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tyler and Agee families, ca. 1917
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Joel C. Tyler at left, wife Emma Farrand Tyler, son Hugh Tyler and daughter Laura Tyler Agee. Laura's children Emma Agee and James Rufus Agee in front. Ca. 1917. From the Hugh Tyler Album.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Group portraits; Families; Children;
